models.description: The measured Bosch Smart Home Controller had the following devices connected: four Bosch Smart Home Radiator Thermostat II (TRV_GEN2), two Bosch Smart Home Radiator Thermostat I (TRV), and two Bosch Smart Home Door/Window Contact II (SWD2).During the 120-second measurement period, the temperature was adjusted both directly on the device itself and via the Smart Home Controller on one TRV thermostat and on one TRV_GEN2 thermostat.
